message: Let's start fair. I'll take most of the money, but I'm willing to share a little.  If you reject this, you'll be getting less in the future.
Alice, your offer was too greedy.  Let's be reasonable - I take a bit more since I have to make up for the first round, but you still get a good chunk.
Okay, I understand you want more.  Let's split it more evenly this time. If you reject this, remember the money is worth less each round. We need to find a solution that works for both of us.
